title: Airplane Types Quiz
description: How well do you remember famous aircraft and their roles in aviation history?

questions.question: The Boeing 747, known as the 'Jumbo Jet,' first entered commercial service in which decade?
The Concorde was a supersonic passenger jet developed jointly by Britain and which other country?
Which aircraft is known as the world's largest commercial passenger plane?
The Wright Flyer, the first powered aircraft, made its historic flight in what year?
Which military aircraft is commonly known as the 'Stealth Bomber'?
The Spitfire was a famous World War II fighter plane from which country?
What type of aircraft is a Cessna 172, one of the most popular planes ever built?
The DC-3, which revolutionized air transport in the 1930s, was built by which company?
Which aircraft holds the record for the fastest manned air-breathing jet flight?
What kind of aircraft is a 'biplane'?
options: A plane with two wings stacked vertically
A plane that seats two people

questions.question: The P-51 Mustang was a long-range fighter used primarily in which conflict?
Which aircraft manufacturer produces the 737, the best-selling commercial jet in history?
A 'seaplane' is designed to do what?
options: Take off and land on water

questions.question: The Enola Gay, which dropped the first atomic bomb, was what type of aircraft?
Which company manufactures the C-130 Hercules, a widely used military transport aircraft?
